On Wed, May 2, 2018 at 11:02 Fausto Milletari ***@***.***> wrote: many thanks, I tried that but unfortunately it says that it is expecting numbers below 2^31 (or something along those lines). I even tried lambda x: np.random.seed(torch.initial_seed() + x) which would be more correct as it would seed each thread with a different seed. Same problem, of course. Well if it says that seed should be an int, you can just trim it as an int.
Adding to a number already too large isn’t the solution.
